column5: This MSc Accounting course supports the development of your professional career in business, accounting and financial management.Course overviewThis course is aligned to the Association of Chartered Certified Accountants (ACCA) professional examinations.Â Successful completion of the course will enhance your understanding of financial management and reporting, performance management, risk and corporate governance.Students will develop an understanding of a range of research methods and analytical techniques through an introduction to research methods.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
